Package DualRace

Class GamepanelDR

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
DualRace.GamepanelDR
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GamepanelDR
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Game panel extends JPanel contains methods to display chosen racetrack and connect to server.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public java.lang.Boolean canStartGame()
      Checks if start game set to true or false. Can only start race if 2 players are connected.
      Returns:
      m_canStart true or false

      Create string with controller car data to send to server and then other player
      Returns:
      controller car data

    • chooseTrack

      public int chooseTrack()
      User select track on program open. Return 0 for rectangle track 1 and 1 for oval track 2

    • startAnimation

      public void startAnimation()
      Start animation, restart if not active.

    • stopAnimation

      public void stopAnimation()
      Stop animation to use in a car collision and end the game.

      carId - - id of car in integer

    • checkCarCollision

      public void checkCarCollision​(java.awt.Graphics g, TrackDR track)
      Checks for collision between cars and track boundaries. Returns opposite speed direction (for fun) on collision with boundary (bounce) or end game for collisions between cars.
      Parameters:
      g - - graphics interface

    • lapCount

      public void lapCount​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Calculate and update lap count according to passing rectangles at start and at halfway point.
      Parameters:
      g - - graphics interface

    • resetGo

      public void resetGo()
      Plays a 3,2,1,go countdown sound file while display ready text, restarts animation and stops displaying text on countdown completion.

    • resetAllCars

      public void resetAllCars()
      Move cars back to start line and set boolean go to true to display ready text while verbal countdown plays.

      public static void sendToTextArea​(java.lang.String mes)
